verses.name: Proverbs 17:23
verses.text: A wicked man taketh a gift out of the bosom to pervert the ways of judgment.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:24
verses.text: Wisdom is before him that hath understanding; but the eyes of a fool are in the ends of the earth.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:25
verses.text: A foolish son is a grief to his father, and bitterness to her that bare him.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:26
verses.text: Also to punish the just is not good, nor to strike princes for equity.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:27
verses.text: He that hath knowledge spareth his words: and a man of understanding is of an excellent spirit.
